alert.note: Alert for Macomb; Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Oakland and central Macomb Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 434 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pontiac, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Warren around 440 PM EDT. Sterling Heights around 445 PM EDT. Clinton and Macomb Township around 450 PM EDT. St. Clair Shores and Mount Clemens around 455 PM EDT. New Baltimore around 500 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Rochester Hills, Roseville, Shelby Township, Clawson, Utica, Fraser, Auburn Hills, Lake Angelus, Bloomfield Hills and Bloomfield Township. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
